name: Star Eggs
overview: Weird deepspace alien Hatcheries approach, bursting with life aimed at Earth's destruction. All hopes and future happiness reside in you, sole pilot of a fighting ship. Eggs crack and ghastly monsters glide spacewards to wreak their dreadful havoc on our homes. yours is the charge: smash each hatching egg, let none escape and Earth is free. But first the Guardians you must overcome...
